Rulings.Tengu:
●This effect targets 1 monster.
●You can destroy a face-down monster with Newdoria.
Rulings.Goat:
●You can destroy a face-down monster with Newdoria.The owner of “Newdoria” decides which monster will be destroyed by “Newdoria’s” effect. 
●“Newdoria’s” effect is mandatory.
